ਇੱਕ (ikk). Represents the number 1 (one) in the Gurmukhi script.
ਤਿੰਨ (tinn). Represents the number 3 (three) in the Gurmukhi script.
ਚਾਰ (cār). Represents the number 4 (four) in the Gurmukhi script.
ਪੰਜ (pañj). Represents the number 5 (five) in the Gurmukhi script.
ਛੇ (chē). Represents the number 6 (six) in the Gurmukhi script.
ਸੱਤ (satt). Represents the number 7 (seven) in the Gurmukhi script.
ਅੱਠ (aṭṭh). Represents the number 8 (eight) in the Gurmukhi script.
ਨੌਂ (nauṁ). Represents the number 9 (nine) in the Gurmukhi script.
